keyword: how many calories is in a dum dum lollipop
title: How Many Calories in a Dum Dum Lollipop?
meta_description: Learn how many calories is in a dum dum lollipop—about 25 kcal—plus carbs, sugars, and full nutrition facts for this classic treat.
h1: How Many Calories in a Dum Dum Lollipop?
assumptions: Standard Dum Dum lollipop (~3 g), cherry or similar flavor, hard candy on a stick, no fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and size; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A single Dum Dum lollipop contains about 25 calories, all from 6 g of sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a dum dum lollipop?
faqs.a: One standard Dum Dum lollipop has about 25 calories.

faqs.q: Are Dum Dum lollipops low carb?
faqs.a: No, each has 6 g carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Dum Dum lollipop have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 g protein and 0 g fat per lollipop.

faqs.q: How do calories vary by Dum Dum flavor?
faqs.a: Most flavors are consistent at ~25 kcal; check labels for specifics.

faqs.q: Is sodium or cholesterol in Dum Dums?
faqs.a: Typically 0 mg sodium and 0 mg cholesterol per lollipop.
